name: WordsandMeanings
0:
”Alexa open word meanings”
”Alexa ask word meanings to enlighten me”
”Alexa ask word meanings to tell me a word”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word meanings
des: We hear a lot of words everyday ,every minute some we know some we don't.It is said that if you want to strengthen your vocabulary you should write and practice 10 new words from your dictionary and use them in conversation but in the present no one has the time to do that.This skill makes sure that you keep learning on the go.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
